artist: Author: Melody Allegra Berger , et al.; Printer: 1984 Printing, Oakland, Calif.; Publisher: Melody Allegra Berger , San Francisco
creditline: Fly Zine Archive, The Mary and Robyn Campbell Fund for Art Books and gift of funds from Mary and Bob Mersky
description: Saddle stitched binding, photomechanical image of abstracted face with text and designs printed in color offset lithography on coated paper covers; 48 pp.
inscription: p. 1, black ink pen: yay, you! / I hope you / (smiley face) / love this issue. / (heart) / melody.
medium: Color and black-and white offset lithography, letterpress; bound volume
title: The F-Word, issue 2
